title: Shady Or Not? She Did What With Her Best Friend's Exes?!
description:
You connected with someone, and you two started dating. But they’ve done something that makes you question their character. And now you’re not certain if you should continue dating them or not – and that’s where we come in! Tell us your situation, and we’ll tell you if their offense is shady or not.
She just found out that her best friend of ten years has been hooking up with her exes! She's beyond upset and doesn't know what to do. Should she confront her or not?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
